Query.Sentence: WITH GOALS_DATA AS ( with movs as( SELECT abs(sum(MOV_AMOUNT)) MOV_AMOUNT, CA_ID, USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_MONTH, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_YEAR FROM MOVEMENTS GROUP BY CA_ID, USER_, MOV_MONTH, MOV_YEAR ) SELECT go.*, ca.CA_NAME , movs.MOV_MONTH, movs.MOV_YEAR, movs.MOV_AMOUNT, (movs.MOV_AMOUNT / go.GO_AMOUNT ) AS SUM_MOV_TO_GO, (movs.MOV_AMOUNT / go.GO_AMOUNT ) *100 AS PERCENTAGE_MOV_TO_GO FROM GOALS go inner join categories ca ON ca.CA_ID= go.CA_ID LEFT join movs on ca.CA_ID= movs.CA_ID and movs.user_ = go.user_ WHERE (movs.MOV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE) AND movs.MOV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)) OR (movs.MOV_AMOUNT IS NULL) ) SELECT * from GOALS_DATA #WHERE#
